power.title: Alacritous Step
power.fluff: Arcane power speeds you into battle

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You teleport up to 5 squares.
If you end this teleportation adjacent to an enemy, you gain a +2 power bonus to your first attack roll against that enemy before the end of your current turn.

power.title: Dimensional Warding
power.fluff: Your warding warps the flow of magic around you, preventing enemies from sneaky escapes or attacks

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You enter the Dimensional Warding stance.
While you remain in the stance, you have an Aura 2 (Arcane). The aura has the following effects:
Enemies inside the aura cannot teleport.
Enemies outside of the aura cannot teleport into the aura.
These effects don't apply to you or your allies teleporting enemies.

catalog.power:
Eldritch Quagmire Swordmage Utility 6 Daily Minor Action> Your spell turns the ground beneath your enemies' feet into gooey mud, which grasps and slows their movement Arcane Aura
Effect: You activate an Aura 2 (Arcane) that lasts until the end of the encounter. You can end the aura as a free action on your turn.
Squares in the aura are difficult terrain for your enemies.
Effect: When this aura ends, choose one enemy within 2 squares of you.
The chosen enemy is immobilized until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Fate-Spurned Foe
power.fluff: Forces beyond your enemy's comprehension work against it at your command

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Choose one enemy you can see.
Until the end of the encounter, the chosen enemy has a -2 penalty to saving throws against any of your effects. This power affects you, not the chosen enemy.

power.title: Nimbus of Shielding
power.fluff: You extend a magical ward around nearby allies

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You enter the Nimbus of Shielding stance.
While you remain in the stance, allies gain a +1 power bonus to AC while adjacent to you.

section.name: Aegis of Shielding:
section.text: +1 power bonus to all defenses.

power.title: Quickling Stride
power.fluff: You move through the battlefield in a blur

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You move up to 12 squares, or up to 5 squares if you are slowed.

power.title: Silversteel Veil
power.fluff: You raise a magical ward of thin, whispy silver mist that seems barely tangible, but it gathers under enemy blows and turns them aside

section.name: Target:
section.target: you and each ally in the burst

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each target gains a +2 power bonus to AC and Reflex until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Stride of the Gallant
power.fluff: With the rush of wind, you blink to your enemy's side, darting around the battlefield in a swirl of sword and spell

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You enter the Stride of the Gallant stance.
While you remain in the stance, you have a teleportation speed equal to teleport 3, but you must end such teleportation adjacent to an enemy.

power.title: Swordmage's Decree
power.fluff: Speaking ancient words of aegis binding, you lower a mantle of magic over your enemies that marks them as your foes

section.name: Prerequisite:
section.text: You must have the arcane aegis class power.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each target is marked by your arcane aegis class power. This does not remove the mark from any other target you might have.

section.name: Special:
section.text: If you only mark one target, you regain this power when you take your next short rest.

power.title: Variable Defense
power.fluff: You summon the strength of the elements to shield you from damage

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Choose one of: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder
Until the end of the encounter, you gain resist against the chosen damage type equal to 3 + your Constitution modifier.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: Equal to 6 + your Constitution modifier.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: Equal to 9 + your Constitution modifier.
Also, you can use the following action at-will once per turn:

section.name: Minor Action:
section.text: You change the chosen damage type to any of the other choices.

power.title: Zephyr of the Barren Sands
power.fluff: You channel the power of the desert winds to briefly lift you into the air

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You fly up to a number of squares equal to your speed. If you don't land at the end of this movement, you fall.
